policy.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:RaiseError>
            <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
        </L7p:RaiseError>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="dmFsdWUx"/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="var1"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="dmFsdWUy"/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="var2"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <L7p:HardcodedResponse>
            <L7p:Base64ResponseBody stringValue="QmFjay1lbmQgLSBIZWxsbyAhCiR7dmFyMX0KJHt2YXIyfQoke290ZWwudHJhY2VJZH0="/>
        </L7p:HardcodedResponse>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>
